Name: Azure Active Directory
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description: The [ Azure Active Directory](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-whatis)  solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Azure Active Directory [Audit](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/concept-audit-logs), [Sign-in](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/concept-sign-ins), [Provisioning](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/concept-provisioning-logs), [Risk Events and Risky User/Service Principal](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/howto-identity-protection-investigate-risk#risky-users) logs using Diagnostic Settings into Microsoft Sentinel.
Analytic Rules:
[
  "AccountCreatedandDeletedinShortTimeframe.yaml",
  "AccountCreatedDeletedByNonApprovedUser.yaml",
  "ADFSDomainTrustMods.yaml",
  "ADFSSignInLogsPasswordSpray.yaml",
  "AdminPromoAfterRoleMgmtAppPermissionGrant.yaml",
  "AnomalousUserAppSigninLocationIncrease-detection.yaml",
  "AuthenticationMethodsChangedforPrivilegedAccount.yaml",
  "AzureAADPowerShellAnomaly.yaml",
  "AzureADRoleManagementPermissionGrant.yaml",
  "AzurePortalSigninfromanotherAzureTenant.yaml",
  "Brute Force Attack against GitHub Account.yaml",
  "BruteForceCloudPC.yaml",
  "BulkChangestoPrivilegedAccountPermissions.yaml",
  "BypassCondAccessRule.yaml",
  "CredentialAddedAfterAdminConsent.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationAdded.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationDeleted.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationInboundCollaborationSettingsChanged.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationInboundDirectSettingsChanged.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationOutboundCollaborationSettingsChanged.yaml",
  "Cross-tenantAccessSettingsOrganizationOutboundDirectSettingsChanged.yaml",
  "DisabledAccountSigninsAcrossManyApplications.yaml",
  "DistribPassCrackAttempt.yaml",
  "ExplicitMFADeny.yaml",
  "ExchangeFullAccessGrantedToApp.yaml",
  "FailedLogonToAzurePortal.yaml",
  "FirstAppOrServicePrincipalCredential.yaml",
  "GuestAccountsAddedinAADGroupsOtherThanTheOnesSpecified.yaml",
  "MailPermissionsAddedToApplication.yaml",
  "MaliciousOAuthApp_O365AttackToolkit.yaml",
  "MaliciousOAuthApp_PwnAuth.yaml",
  "MFARejectedbyUser.yaml",
  "MultipleAdmin_membership_removals_from_NewAdmin.yaml",
  "NewAppOrServicePrincipalCredential.yaml",
  "NRT_ADFSDomainTrustMods.yaml",
  "NRT_AuthenticationMethodsChangedforVIPUsers.yaml",
  "nrt_FirstAppOrServicePrincipalCredential.yaml",
  "NRT_NewAppOrServicePrincipalCredential.yaml",
  "NRT_PIMElevationRequestRejected.yaml",
  "NRT_PrivlegedRoleAssignedOutsidePIM.yaml",
  "NRT_UseraddedtoPrivilgedGroups.yaml",
  "PIMElevationRequestRejected.yaml",
  "PrivilegedAccountsSigninFailureSpikes.yaml",
  "PrivlegedRoleAssignedOutsidePIM.yaml",
  "RareApplicationConsent.yaml",
  "SeamlessSSOPasswordSpray.yaml",
  "Sign-in Burst from Multiple Locations.yaml",
  "SigninAttemptsByIPviaDisabledAccounts.yaml",
  "SigninBruteForce-AzurePortal.yaml",

  "SuccessThenFail_DiffIP_SameUserandApp.yaml",
  "SuspiciousAADJoinedDeviceUpdate.yaml",
  "SuspiciousOAuthApp_OfflineAccess.yaml",
  "SuspiciousServicePrincipalcreationactivity.yaml",
  "UnusualGuestActivity.yaml",
  "UserAccounts-CABlockedSigninSpikes.yaml",
  "UseraddedtoPrivilgedGroups.yaml",

  "NewOnmicrosoftDomainAdded.yaml"
]
